name: Lars Roettig
bio: Software Engineer at TechDivision GmbH and Maintainer of the Community Engineering Team at Magento. He has 8 years of professional SoftwareEngineering experience. Lars is passionate about Magento and Open Source.

name: Jordan Eisenburger
bio: Jordan has been working within the Magento Eco system for 5 years. One of his roles within Experius is the innovator. Researching new systems, solutions and technologies in the frontend working field. He is also a PWA Studio maintainer and enthousiast.
